function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misleading media coverage of contagious diseases","Impact":"Negative influence on destination image and tourism","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and responsible reporting","Technologies":"Media monitoring and content analysis tools","People":"Tourists, destination marketers, local businesses","Owner":"Media organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Stigmatization of locations affected by contagious diseases","Impact":"Reduction in tourism and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Education, awareness campaigns, and sensitivity training","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, online education platforms","People":"Residents of affected locations, tourists, local businesses","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate labeling and misinformation about contagious diseases","Impact":"Adverse effects on country and destination image","Mitigation":"Public health education and accurate communication","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, social media monitoring","People":"Tourists, destination marketers, local businesses","Owner":"Government health agencies, tourism boards"}]}
